title: cryptoworkers
author: cryptoworkers
content: Hello there,I would like to share some of my works and i would like to offer my services to you :I offer :Professional Logo Design- 3 Different concepts to pick- Delivering in 24h after orderProfessional Website- Depend what you need- I can make Ico, Ptc site, Any kind of business site, i can connect wallets to the site, i can make more complex site but we need to disscus what actually needs to be done.I can provide 3d Realistic Nft designs , i can also mint them and make whole collection if needed.My email : info@edin-design.comMy website/portfolio : https://edin-design.comI work for the Uk company : https://dijitul.ukMy telegram : https://t.me/mentrixcompanyFeel free to DM me here also, i will be active on daily basis. Looking forward to make some awesome works !

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Finally, a designer with a nice portfolio.Â   You have some great NFT works there. Could you also showcase some of your logo designs and web designs?
